hanzi-su-wiki:
殺

Значения

Убивать; отрезать, уродовать

Мнемоника

Махать деревянной 木 палкой направо и налево, колотить 殳.

Варианты

杀
purpleculture_pinyin:
shā
to kill; to murder; to attack; to weaken or reduce; to smart (dialect); (used after a verb) extremely
убить; убивать; нападать; ослабить или уменьшить; на умный (диалект); (употребляется после глагола) чрезвычайно
rtega_mnemonic:
殺殺RS
杀杀		kill, slaughter, murder, hurt, to pare off, reduce, clip
  • hand 㐅 using a weapon 殳 to kill, just like chopping off tree branches 朩; hand 㐅 chopping off tree branches 朩
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 杀)
Pictophonetic: 杀 indicates the sound; 殳 (weapon) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
殺害 [ shā hài ]: to murder
殺手 [ shā shǒu ]: killer; murderer; hit man; (sports) formidable player
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 杀 [ shā ] to kill, to murder, to slaughter; to hurt
    • 殳 [ shū ] tool, weapon
heisig_chinese_memo: Wolverine leaps over a tree and with one swipe of his claws kills a bad guy aiming a missile launcher.
heisig_constituent: kill, sheaf, tree, wood, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
Keyword_KANJIDIC: kill, murder, butcher, slice off, split, diminish, reduce, spoil
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: убийство, убийство, мясник, отрежет, раскол, уменьшается, уменьшить, захваченный
koohiiStory1: X marks the spot on the tree where the missile hit. No doubt, it was meant to kill us.
koohiiStory2: I suppose when this kanji was made, it was most effective to kill your enemies with sheafs of wood used as missiles.
jp_example_words:
暗殺(あんさつ): assassination
殺人(さつじん): murder
殺す(ころす): kill
自殺(じさつ): suicide
jp_readingExamples: 殺人 (さつじん), 殺到 (さっとう), 黙殺 (もくさつ), 相殺 (そうさい), 殺す (ころ.す)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's treasure in this tree so you take out your weapon and kill it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You didn't just cut the tree down, you stabbed it and sliced it and killed it to death.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After the kill though, you didn't feel so good, and you had to sats (さつ) down. Woah, I mean sat... sats? Uh oh. Something is happening to you. You sats down but your brain is all funny and you can't get up again.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You sats down after killing the tree because now the tree is getting its revenge and killing you back. Was there poison in the tree? And where is the treasure that was up there?!
Ru_Meaning: kill, murder, butcher, slice off, split, diminish, reduce, spoil
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), ノ, 几 (стол), 又 (опять), 木 (дерево), 殳 (удар)
Ru_trainchinese:
shā: (глаг) убивать, умерщвлять; уменьшать(ся); (диал.) саднить, щипать
shā: (глаг) сражаться, бороться; уничтожать, портить; (после глагола или прилагательного) крайне, очень
Kanshudo_mnemonic: from the tree (木) you can use crossed swords (乂) or a lance shaft (殳) to kill
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Wolverine gets sick of his claws and starts killing the bad guys with a metal pole instead.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle has the character form " ◎ " from " worm " to "攴". Chen Jian thinks it is the predecessor of the word " kill ". The " killing " in gold is to add the symbol "人" to the simplified form of " ◎ " ([虫攴]). See 𩰫Yu Bi Ding and 𩰫 Bi 簋盖 for the font. This glyph is written next to the person in the lower left corner, combined with the " worm " written upside down and small dots on it, it becomes like a single body with a dishevelled figure, like the right side of the ancient text " 𢽘 " in " Suo Wen". The original meaning of " kill " is to kill. (Chen Jian) It is said that the word " ◎ " ([虫攴]) in the oracle bone inscriptions is the original text of "to kill ", and its original meaning is to strike. (Liu Yun)

Jinwen means killing. For example, Yau Biding: "□Fu has a dagger (compared), and (ju) shoots (disappears) Tianyi, then kills." It means that if you dare not pay him more than he deserves , And if Ju stopped destroying the division of the town, he should be killed. (Qiu Xigui)

Chu has a text-based " kill heterogeneous" in, and "Wen said," " kill " the classical " 𢁛 similar to" see Guodian Jane <Tang Yu Road> <a language bundle> and <language plexus three> each The font of the article. (Chen Wei)

An example of " killing " means killing in ancient books is like "Zuo Zhuan. The Second Year of Huan Gong: "In the spring of the second year, Governor Song attacked Kong's family, killed Kong's father and took his wife." "Mandarin. "Lu Yu": "If a minister violates the rule of the emperor, he must kill him."

" Kill " also means decline and withering. Such as "Rituals. "Shi Guan Li": "A man who is an official and nobleman can be killed by virtue." "Chang Li": "My first monarch Zhou Gong was sealed to Lu. There is no danger of mountains, forests and valleys. The princes can reach all sides. It is the day of the old land, and the descendants will kill." Gao luo's note: "Kill, decay." It also means that the vegetation is withered. . Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. Should be the same": "At the time of Yu, the heavens saw that the vegetation would not be killed in autumn and winter, and Yu said "Wooden Qi wins."

" Kill " also means warring and fighting. For example, Chapter 1 of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms": "At the dawn, Zhang Liang and Zhang Bao defeated the remnant soldiers and drove away." "Yu Shiming said. Ge Linggong sent out Zhuer": "Li Cunzhang, a famous general in the Tang dynasty, this time, he was defeated by a big defeat, watching the wind and fleeing, abandoning his equipment and horses, countless."

" Kill " can be used as an adverb to express a deep degree. For example, Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Qing Ming" Part 2: "The spring water comes to Dongting wide, Bai Ping is anxious to kill the pasqueflower." The second fold of Guan Hanqing's "Dou E's Injustice" in the Yuan Dynasty: "Wu's don't kill me too!"
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle has the form " ◎ " from " worm " to "攴". Chen Jian believes that it is the predecessor of the word " kill ". "To kill " in bronze is to add the meaning " person " to the simplified form of " ◎ " ([虫攴]). The original meaning of " kill " is to kill.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文有從「虫」從「攴」的字形「◎」，陳劍認為是「殺」字的前身。金文的「殺」就是在「◎」（[虫攴]）的簡體上加上意符「人」，字形參見𩰫攸比鼎和𩰫比簋蓋。這種字形的人旁寫在左下角，與上面倒寫的「虫」旁和小點結合，就變成好像一個獨體的披頭散髮的人形之類，像《說文》古文「𢽘」的右邊。「殺」的本義是殺戮。（陳劍）一說甲骨文的「◎」（[虫攴]）字是「殺」的初文，本義是擊打。（劉雲）

　　金文表示殺戮。如𩰫攸比鼎：「□弗具付𩰫匕（比），其且（沮）射（厭）分田邑，則殺。」意思是如敢不把𩰫比所應得的都付給他，而沮止破壞分田邑之事的，就應被殺。（裘錫圭）

　　戰國楚系文字有「殺」的異構，與《說文》「殺」的古文「𢁛」相近，參見郭店簡〈唐虞之道〉、〈語叢一〉和〈語叢三〉各篇的字形。（陳偉）

　　古書中「殺」表示殺戮的例子如《左傳．桓公二年》：「二年春，宋督攻孔氏，殺孔父而取其妻。」《國語．魯語》：「臣違君命者，亦不可不殺也。」

　　「殺」也表示衰敗、凋零。如《儀禮．士冠禮》：「以官爵人，德之殺也。」《呂氏春秋．長利》：「吾先君周公封於魯，無山林谿谷之險，諸侯四面以達，是故地日削，子孫彌殺。」高誘注：「殺，衰也。」又表示草木枯萎。如《呂氏春秋．應同》：「及禹之時，天先見草木秋冬不殺，禹曰『木氣勝』。」

　　「殺」還表示交戰、戰鬥。如《三國演義》第1回：「殺到天明，張梁、張寶引敗殘軍士，奪路而走。」《喻世明言．葛令公生遣弄珠兒》：「李存璋唐朝名將，這一陣，殺得大敗虧輸，望風而遁，棄下器械馬匹，不計其數。」

　　「殺」可作副詞，表示程度深。如唐代杜甫〈清明〉之二：「春水春來洞庭闊，白蘋愁殺白頭翁。」元代關漢卿《竇娥冤》第二折：「兀的不痛殺我也！」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文有從「虫」從「攴」的字形「◎」，陳劍認為是「殺」字的前身。金文的「殺」就是在「◎」（[虫攴]）的簡體上加上意符「人」。「殺」的本義是殺戮。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
殺 (Simplified: 杀)
Pinyin: shā
English Definition: to kill; to murder; to attack; to weaken or reduce; to smart (dialect); (used after a verb) extremely
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 殳
Pictophonetic: 杀 indicates the sound; 殳 (weapon) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 杀 [ shā ] to kill, to murder, to slaughter; to hurt
    • 殳 [ shū ] tool, weapon
Example Words:
殺害 [ shā hài ]: to murder
殺手 [ shā shǒu ]: killer; murderer; hit man; (sports) formidable player
More: 殺* | *殺 | *殺*

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 殺 from hand-action 殳 shū and grain-kill (杀)𣏂 shā B094 杀[殺] F045 (杀)𣏂 simp 杀 name- grain-cut (杀)殺 shā.

殺殺RS
杀杀 		kill, slaughter, murder, hurt, to pare off, reduce, clip
  • hand 㐅 using a weapon 殳 to kill, just like chopping off tree branches 朩; hand 㐅 chopping off tree branches 朩
(Simplified: 杀)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 杀 indicates the sound; 殳 (weapon) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 杀 [ shā ] to kill, to murder, to slaughter; to hurt
    • 殳 [ shū ] tool, weapon
①使人或動物失去生命：殺生。殺敵。殺雞取卵。殺一儆百。
②戰鬥，搏鬥：殺出重圍。
③消減：殺風景。
④藥物等刺激身體感覺疼痛：肥皂水殺了眼睛。
⑤收束：殺價。殺尾。
⑥勒緊，扣緊：殺車。
⑦用在動詞後，表示程度深：笑殺人。恨殺。
殺害 [ shā hài ]: to murder
殺手 [ shā shǒu ]: killer; murderer; hit man; (sports) formidable player
(Simplified: 杀)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 杀 indicates the sound; 殳 (weapon) conveys the meaning.

暗殺(あんさつ): assassination
殺人(さつじん): murder
殺す(ころす): kill
自殺(じさつ): suicide

甲骨文有從「 虫 」從「 攴 」的字形「 ◎ 」，陳劍認為是「 殺 」字的前身。金文的「 殺 」就是在「 ◎ 」（[虫攴]）的簡體上加上意符「 人 」，字形參見𩰫攸比鼎和𩰫比簋蓋。這種字形的人旁寫在左下角，與上面倒寫的「 虫 」旁和小點結合，就變成好像一個獨體的披頭散髮的人形之類，像《說文》古文「 𢽘 」的右邊。「 殺 」的本義是殺戮。（陳劍）一說甲骨文的「 ◎ 」（[虫攴]）字是「 殺 」的初文，本義是擊打。（劉雲） 金文表示殺戮。如𩰫攸比鼎：「□弗具付𩰫匕（比），其且（沮）射（厭）分田邑，則殺。」意思是如敢不把𩰫比所應得的都付給他，而沮止破壞分田邑之事的，就應被殺。（裘錫圭） 戰國楚系文字有「 殺 」的異構，與《說文》「 殺 」的古文「 𢁛 」相近，參見郭店簡〈唐虞之道〉、〈語叢一〉和〈語叢三〉各篇的字形。（陳偉） 古書中「 殺 」表示殺戮的例子如《左傳．桓公二年》：「二年春，宋督攻孔氏，殺孔父而取其妻。」《國語．魯語》：「臣違君命者，亦不可不殺也。」 「 殺 」也表示衰敗、凋零。如《儀禮．士冠禮》：「以官爵人，德之殺也。」《呂氏春秋．長利》：「吾先君周公封於魯，無山林谿谷之險，諸侯四面以達，是故地日削，子孫彌殺。」高誘注：「殺，衰也。」又表示草木枯萎。如《呂氏春秋．應同》：「及禹之時，天先見草木秋冬不殺，禹曰『木氣勝』。」 「 殺 」還表示交戰、戰鬥。如《三國演義》第1回：「殺到天明，張梁、張寶引敗殘軍士，奪路而走。」《喻世明言．葛令公生遣弄珠兒》：「李存璋唐朝名將，這一陣，殺得大敗虧輸，望風而遁，棄下器械馬匹，不計其數。」 「 殺 」可作副詞，表示程度深。如唐代杜甫〈清明〉之二：「春水春來洞庭闊，白蘋愁殺白頭翁。」元代關漢卿《竇娥冤》第二折：「兀的不痛殺我也！」

殺字的基本解释

殺
shā
见“杀”。

殺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所八切，入黠，生。］
“杀1”的繁体字。
(1)杀戮。
(2)死，致死。
(3)死刑。
(4)指流放。
(5)克，战胜。
(6)攻杀，战斗。
(7)棋类术语。指围死或击败对方。亦泛指对弈。
(8)灭，除去。
(9)指熄灭。
(10)伤害，败坏。
(11)秋季阴气肃杀。
(12)引申指草木枯萎。
(13)田猎。
(14)指猎获物。
(15)收割；砍伐。
(16)整治。
(17)谓医治。
(18)终止；收束。
(19)死板，无可变动。
(20)缚紧，勒紧。
(21)压抑，抑制。
(22)方言。刺激。
(23)副词。用在谓语后面，表示程度之深。
(24)用在谓语前，有很、甚之意。
(25)突厥语shad的译音。也译作“設”、“察”等。突厥、回纥等族别部领兵者之称。

殺字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　殺； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页585第11
〔古文〕???????【唐韻】所八切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】山戛切，?音煞。【說文】戮也。【周禮·春官】內史掌王之八柄之法，以詔王治。五曰殺。【疏】太宰有誅無殺。此有殺無誅者，誅與殺相因，見爲過不止，則殺之也。又【秋官】掌戮，掌斬殺賊諜而搏之。【註】斬以鈇鉞，殺以刀刃。　又【爾雅·釋詁】殺，克也。【郭註】隱元年公羊傳曰：克之者何，殺之也。　又獲也。【禮·王制】天子殺，則下大綏。諸侯殺，則下小綏。大夫殺，則止佐車。【註】殺，獲也。　又同死。【孟子】凶年不能殺。　又忘也。【莊子·大宗師】殺生者不死。【註】李軌云：殺，猶亡也。亡生者不死也。崔云：除其營生爲殺生。　又薙草曰殺。【禮·月令】利以殺草。　又霜殺物曰殺。【春秋·僖三十三年】隕霜不殺草。【左傳·桓五年】始殺而嘗。　又以火炙簡爲殺靑。【後漢·吳佑傳】欲殺靑?，以寫經書。【註】殺靑者，以火炙?令汗，取其靑，易書，復不蠹，謂之殺靑。亦爲汗靑，義見【劉向·別錄】。　又矢名。【周禮·夏官·司弓矢】殺矢、鍭

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The eight cuts in "Guangyun", enter the key, and are born. ]
Traditional characters for "杀1".
(1) Killing.
(2) Death, lethal.
(3) The death penalty.
(4) Refers to exile.
(5) Grams, victory.
(6) Attack, kill, and fight.
(7) Chess terms. Refers to siege or defeat the opponent. Also refers to the game in general.
(8) Off, remove.
(9) Refers to extinguishing.
(10) Damage and corruption.
(11) In autumn, the yin qi is dead.
(12) The extension refers to the wilting of vegetation.
(13) Field hunting.
(14) Refers to prey.
(15) Harvesting; cutting down.
(16) Remediation.
(17) It means healing.
(18) Termination; closing.
(19) Rigid and unchangeable.
(20) Tighten and tighten.
(21) Repression, suppression.
(22) Dialects. stimulate.
(23) Adverbs. Used after the predicate to indicate the depth of the degree.
(24) Used before the predicate, it has a very or even meaning.
(25) Transliteration of shad in Turkic language. Also translated as "set", "chat" and so on. It is called the leader of the tribes of Turks and Huihe.
[②]［shài］
["Guangyun" worships cut, go to blame, and give birth. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Pan Character Department] 　杀; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 585 No. 11
[Ancient text]?????? [Tang Yun] All eight cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Shan Jia cuts, the sound is evil. [Said the text] Slaughter also. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan】The eight-handed method of the king of internal history is governed by the edict. Five said to kill. [Sparse] Dazai has no punishment but no killing. If there is one who kills without punish, punish and kill are related to each other. If you see more than a fault, then kill it. Also [Autumn Official] palm slaughter, palm slaying thieves and fighting spies. [Note] To cut with 鈇yue, to kill with a blade.　[Erya·Shu Xiu] Kill, but also. [Guo's Note] In the first year of Yin, Gongyang Chuan said: Whoever can overcome it, kill it.　Get it again. 【Rite · King System】When the emperor kills, he will go to Dasui. If the princes are killed, Xiao Sui will go down. When the doctor kills, the car is stopped. [Note] To kill, get also.　 Die together again. [Mencius] The fierce year cannot be killed.　I forgot again. [Zhuangzi·Grand Master] The killer does not die. [Note] Li Guiyun: Killing is still dead. The dead do not die either. Cui Yun: Except for his livelihood, he kills.　 Then Naicao said to kill. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】Lead to kill weeds.　You Shuang killed things and said to kill. [Chunqiu·Xi Thirty Years] Meteorite does not kill the grass. [Zuo Zhuan·Five Years of Huan] Begin to kill and taste.　 Again, the fire is simply called killing. [Later Han·Wu You Biography] Want to kill 靑? in order to write scriptures. [Note] Those who kill 靑 will burn it with fire? In order to make the sweat, take the 靑, change the book, and no 靑, it is called killing 靑. It is also sweat, righteous see [Liu Xiang·Bielu].　Again. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Si Gong Shi】Slaying Arrows and Ghosts

Name meaning

shā, shài
вм. 杀
Radicals: メ, 木, 殳  (treasure, tree, weapon)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's treasure in this tree so you take out your weapon and kill it.
You didn't just cut the tree down, you stabbed it and sliced it and killed it to death.
Reading Mnemonic
After the kill though, you didn't feel so good, and you had to sats (さつ) down. Woah, I mean sat... sats? Uh oh. Something is happening to you. You sats down but your brain is all funny and you can't get up again.
You sats down after killing the tree because now the tree is getting its revenge and killing you back. Was there poison in the tree? And where is the treasure that was up there?!
